items.title: Bulk deals: Adani Infra buys additional 21.8% stake worth Rs 554 crore in PSP Projects. Promoter offloads 24.47% shares
items.description: Considering the shareholding pattern updated at the end of June 2025, the shareholding of Adani Group in PSP Projects seems to have increased to 33.15 percent.

items.title: Top gainers & losers: Stocks that moved the most on August 4
Taking Stock: Market snaps 2-day fall; Nifty above 24,700, Sensex jumps 419 pts
items.description: All the other sectoral indices ended in the green with PSU Bank, pharma, realty, IT, metal, telecom, media, consumer durables, auto up 0.5-2.5 percent.

items.title: Nifty Reclaims 24,700 As Buying In Metals & Autos Powers Rebound| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Ashish Bahety, Technical and Derivative Research Analyst, ProfitMart Securities to navigate market movement.

items.title: Bajaj Auto Q1 Preview: Muted domestic sales and margin pressure to cap earnings growth
items.description: Bajaj Auto share price: "EBITDA margin will decline post being stable last year, on the back of higher raw material costs and a spike in ocean freight rates," HDFC Securities said in a preview note.

items.title: Hero MotoCorp Q1 Preview: Steep volume decline to dent revenue and profitability
items.description: Hero MotoCorp share price: The company encountered production challenges in April, which disrupted output and affected dispatches.

items.title: Mankind Pharma shares rise 2.17% in today's session
items.description: Shares of Mankind Pharma were trading at Rs 2,622.00, a gain of 2.17% in Monday's session.

items.title: Ather Energy Q1 loss marginally narrows to Rs 178 crore, revenue jumps 79%; shares rally 13%
items.description: Ather Energy Q1 Results: The shares of the company sharply rallied to a fresh 52-week high of Rs 392 apiece after the results were released.

items.title: This Tata Group company announces 1:10 stock split: What it means for shareholders?
items.description: Tata Investment Corporation stock split: The Tata Group company said it has approved the stock split in order to "enhance the liquidity of Company's equity shares and to encourage participation of retail investors by making equity shares of the Company more affordable".
